channel.title: The Studio Apple TV+ on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Studio Apple TV+ on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sony Pictures CEO Tom Rothman Slams Depiction of Hollywood Execs in ‘The Studio: “We’re Not Morons”
item.description: Rothman said that many parts of the Apple TV+ series, which stars Seth Rogen as a studio executive, are “horseshit.”
